title: Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Employee Self Service Vulnerability

titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Employee Self Service Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory SAP Employee Self Service Vulnerability

sentences: SAP Employee Self Service could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper input validation. By gaining access to the Sysmon event logs, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain personal information of other users, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
Current SAP customers should refer to SAP note for patch information, available from the SAP Web site (login required).<crlf>SAP Website
